author: dkhaywood
msg: trying to get a clean compile via Maven: now using surefire 2.4 plugin, and junit 4.4, jmock 2.4, hamcrest 1.1 as dependencies.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Initial take-on of org.nakedobjects.corelib.  The idea of this is to move stuff that our tests might depend on (such as DisabledException) but that typically our domain objects would not).  Note that this stuff is intended to be agnostic of the programming model.
It's also possible that some of the stuff from applib might move here, eg Fixtures and Clock.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Adding org.nakedobjects.testviewer.integ.junit4.testlib (aka XAT2's library for writing tests using JUnit4, eg @RunWith test runner and other annotations).  It's possible that some of the stuff in this project may become generic to tests written for any test runner (eg TestNG) ... but for now let's just focus on JUnit4.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Now compiles against DI branch (but that's about it).

author: dkhaywood
msg: Now compiles against DI branch (but that's about it).  Includes a new JavaNotifyingReflector which will provide the proxy support (think I need to rename this class).
